pageContext.claim: “We ended the war on American energy, and the United States is now the number one producer of oil and natural gas on earth.”
pageContext.analysis: This is wrong. There was no "war on energy" to end or energy revolution to start. The United States has led the world in natural gas production since 2009. Crude oil production has been increasing rapidly since 2010, reaching record levels in August 2018, according to U.S. Energy Information Administration data. In September 2018, the United States passed both Russia and Saudi Arabia to become the largest global crude oil producer. It is expected to hold that position, according to predictions from the International Energy Agency.
